overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "Dammit Take It Easy" — The famous Michael and Philip duo, along with superhung Peter, satisfy all of their sexual desires poolside. "Behind The Barn Door" —  David stands outside, leaning against the weathered old barn, peering through the dirty window. He often watches Peter working on his vintage car. He wants him, wants him bad, but does he have the balls to go inside? "If You Want It, Work For It" — Stood up by his date, the horny Marine looked over at her brother Bill. He noticed for the first time how good looking the guy was and how much he resembled his sister. If you can't have one, the other will do.
title: Take It
